content: skill level | intermediate available sizes | baby toddler child teen & adult if you re looking for a crochet hat that s as pretty as it is cozy look no further than the puff hat here at b hooked thousands of people have made this hat our most popular pattern and for good reason it s still our favorite to gift and wear ourselves this project will likely give you an important lesson in gauge although it s a basic hat with a simple repeat puff stitches bring a certain level of variation from person to person this variation usually causes puff stitches of different heights and therefore differences in finished size keep that in mind as you move forward
